mapper.insert: insert into userInfo ( id, roleId, name, pwd, gender, classId, deptId, createTime ) values ( seq_for_userInfo.nextval, #{obj.roleId}, #{obj.name}, #{obj.pwd}, #{obj.gender}, #{obj.classId}, #{obj.deptId}, sysdate )
mapper.select: select * from (select u.*,rownum rn from (select * from userInfo) u where #{end} >= rownum) where rn > #{start}
